title: engum illAda atishaya piLLai
sahitya:
engum illAda atishaya piLLai eppaDittAn peTrALO idu mAdiri yadu gOkulam 
idu nAL varai kaNDadillai poduvAi oru mozhi kUravum buddhiyum illai shaktiyumillai


anupallavi

  tangu taDaiyinri UriluLLa veNNait-tAzhiyellAm koLLai pOghudE 
singArac-cirumiyar nIrADap-pOnAl avar sElai ellAm koLLai pOghudE 
Dingu taLAngu taNangu dhimi enru pAmbu mElE sEvaDi naTamADudE
Tiriginra kALai pOL aDakkuvArillAmal cellam aLavu mIrip-pOghudE


caraNam 1    anjukkireNDenru aDigaL koDuttAn anji koruttikku sElai koDuttAn 
anjukkireNDenru aravu piDittAn aivar koruttirukku puDavaiyaik-koDuttAn
    caraNam 2    nanjUTTa vandadOr vanjat-tarakkikku nALum kiDaikkAda mOkSam koDuttAn 
konjamum bandhangaL pArAdu vanduLLa gOpigaLai kATTil tiriya viDuttAn
kuzhalonru pEr sholli kovvai kaniyidazh azhagAna muraLikku amudenru koDuttAn
    caraNam 3    nALtOrum eNNi tolaiyAda pAvangaL nADi sheidAn oru pAvi 
nArAyaNA enru tAn peTra piLLaiyai nETTazhaittAnAm kUvi
mADErum kAlanin dUtargaL anjavE vaikuNTham pOnAnAm tAvi
mAnE idu kELAyaDi nArAyaNA nAmAvaLi vAnE tarum IdEDi tAnE tanil tAnAghiya
